job_purpose: Join a dynamic team at Information Quality in Perth to provide support to Energy, Mining, Infrastructure, Renewables, and Defence industries through training and development in Engineering Design.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Develop, audit, and review engineering deliverables using 2D CAD and Intelligent Engineering Application Software
Work in small and large teams with good people skills
Comply with Company policies and procedures
Produce quality work with accuracy in design
Perform comparisons on Engineering Data sources using MS Excel, MS Access, and industry tools
Assist in identifying deficiencies in engineering information
required_qualifications: Ability to establish priorities and manage time effectively
Basic knowledge of databases, data management, or information technology
company_details: Information Quality focuses on training and nurturing individuals to excel in Engineering Design for various industries. They value People First, Honesty & Integrity, Doing the Right Thing, and Thinking Outside the Box. The company promotes diversity and encourages applications from a wide range of backgrounds.
